articleData.blog_content:
My journey in desire began way back when I was a newbie 1st year student at KIIT. In the 3 years since, I've learnt and experienced so much in Desire that it fills me with joy and pride.

From playing and organising games, to visiting slums for surveying under the harsh sunlight and hanging out with our family, it's been one of the most enriching experiences of my life.

Desire turned my ordinary college weekends into extraordinary adventures and no matter where I go, I'll forever treasure the time I spent here.
